scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 execute good-job-db --local --file=./drizzle/migrations/0000_illegal_cobalt_man.sql && wrangler d1 execute good-job-db --local --file=./drizzle/migrations/0001_curved_nick_fury.sql
scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 execute good-job-db --remote --file=./drizzle/migrations/0000_illegal_cobalt_man.sql && wrangler d1 execute good-job-db --remote --file=./drizzle/migrations/0001_curved_nick_fury.sql
